positions.comment: On the hook in Prickley Bay, Grenada after passage from BVI
Approaching Los Testigos after overnight sail from Grenada--all;s well
Three anchors down in lagoon  just N of Ven mainland.  We''re OK!
Anchored between Islas Caracas, on N shore  of Isla C. Oeste, all well
Arrived Bahia Redonda, puerto la cruz,VZ. for hurricane season.All''s well.
Holiday time w/ Alison, out east of PLC, at islas Arapos, retng to PLC tmw. OK
